thread.title: Fly and Cruise for less with Silversea
thread.title_full: Fly and Cruise for less with Silversea

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Fly and Cruise for less with Silversea
text:
Fly and Cruise for less with Silversea Fly and Cruise for less with Silversea Details Created   11:45 Silversea launches exclusive air promotion for UK customers Cruising in Africa, South Pacific, Asia and the Caribbean is now more accessible than ever before with the launch of return airfares for just £299 with Silversea. The promotion is available only to customers living in the UK and is available on select voyages from September through to March 2016. 
From the white-capped seas of the Cape to the exotic streets of Zanzibar, experience the charms of Africa’s striking geographical and cultural diversity. Embrace the delights of the Far East from the pristine beaches of the Miyako islands to the legendary “floating” gate of Torii, while beautiful skies and balmy breezes will ensure an exquisite sojourn on a Caribbean voyage this winter. “We are delighted to offer this exclusive airfare promotion allowing our UK guests to embark on extraordinary voyages to amazing destinations with an exceptionally good value airfare of £299,” said Lisa McAuley, Silversea Commercial Director UK and Ireland. Available on voyages in both the expedition and classic fleet, travellers are able to enjoy a unique journey to some of the world’s most exotic destinations. Related articles
